dmca.title: Copyright Infringement: Universal City Studios
dmca.body:
SpinnNet recieved this notice today which points to your DSL account as 
the originator of the listed copyright violations. Please read it and 
remove the offending materials immediately.

-------- Original Message --------
Subject: DMCA Notification [Notice ID: 935456]
Date: Wed, 13 Aug 2003 01:55:10 -0700
From: [Private]Reply-To: [Private]
To: [Private]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Re:  Unauthorized Use of Universal Motion Pictures
Notice ID: 935456
11 Aug 2003 23:15:03 GMT

Dear Sir or Madam:

Universal City Studios Productions LLLP and its affiliated companies 
(collectively,  "Universal" are the exclusive owners of copyrights in 
many motion pictures, including the motion pictures listed below.

It has come to our attention that SpinnNet is the service provider for 
the IP address listed below, from which unauthorized copying and 
distribution (downloading, uploading, file serving, file  "swapping" or 
[WINDOWS-1252?]other similar activities) of Universal
